document.full_text: an italian court sentenced italy's former central bank governor antonio fazio on saturday to four years in jail for market-rigging related to a 2005 takeover battle over italian bank banca antonveneta.
document.title: ex-bank of italy chief sentenced to 4 years in jail
lines_and_colors: an italian court sentenced italy's former central bank governor antonio fazio on saturday to four years in jail for market-rigging related to a 2005 takeover battle over italian bank banca antonveneta.
